item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
OK, with "Don’t try to solve every single problem" principle, I gave the try to solve the problem.
I reinstalled the bridge host as well, anyway it's coming back with all data though disk had been partitioned into two partitions, but I don't care - I will run my data migration which was stopped by this OS upgrade, and after that I will install a fresh new Ubuntu.
item.content:encoded:
OK, with “Don’t try to solve every single problem” principle, I gave the try to solve the problem.

I reinstalled the bridge host as well, anyway it’s coming back with all data though disk had been partitioned into two partitions, but I don’t care – I will run my data migration which was stopped by this OS upgrade, and after that I will install a fresh new Ubuntu.
